title: Bug 261808iajcAntTask fails "type already defined"
description: Created attachment 123223 [details]Eclipseprojectexport that demonstrates the errorAs attachment you find a simple EclipseProject, which reproduces the error. The projectstructure consists of two packages "anttest" and "anttest.test". The second package should not be included in the build, so I was trying to exclude it using a dirset. This does not work, because with this configuration iajc always fails with an "already defined"error for every type (class or aspect).As comment I included a simple workaround for this problem in the iajctask. This workaround does its job, but I want to reuse the sourcepathdefinition, which is not possible this way.
